title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 404.5 - Termination of agreements or contracts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 404.5 - Termination of agreements or contracts

State Regulations
(a) Every agreement or contract between a
licensee and a licensee service provider, or a non- licensee service provider, to hold, or have access to, or to effectuate possession of, by any means, the
monies of the licensee's debtors in contract with the licensee for budget
planning services, or to distribute, or be in the chain of distribution of such
monies, to creditors of such debtors, shall provide that the agreement or
contract shall not be terminated without at least 30 days written notice to the
party against whom termination is being sought. (b) A licensee shall immediately notify the
superintendent, in writing, of such termination, upon the sending of by the
licensee, or upon the receipt by the licensee, of the notice of
termination. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
404.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
